attributes.action: Conscript yourself and Tony Blair into the front line of combat in Iraq and Afghanistan if you truly think the wars were justifiable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
conscript yourself and Tony Blair into the front line of combat in Iraq and Afghanistan if you truly think the wars were justifiable.

If you really think this was a just war you should both go and fight in it and risk your lives to prove that and show a good example to the men and woman of Britain who you have asked to fight and die in these two wars.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
